alert.note: Alert for North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 22 at 9:47PM MDT until October 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM MDT SUNDAY THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Limon. * WHEN...From 9 AM MDT Sunday through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Avoid outdoor burning or any activity that may cause sparks. The strong winds will likely fuel rapid fire growth.

area.areaDesc: North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County
